1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Jay and Sandy hit it off in a club, but after 6 months Sandy heard rumours about Jay with another woman and ended the relationship. Amy and Tom met online and were together for a year but Tom's jealousy ended their romance.

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Ryan is desperate to get back with Georgina. Suspicions of cheating destroyed the trust between Kenya and Saed. Lizzie and Olivia broke up but still have feelings for each other.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Matt had commitment issues, but now hopes to win back Emma. Ronan and Nick were school sweethearts. Imogen ended it with Ben when she suspected him of cheating.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Scott's infidelity has left Laura wondering whether she can trust him. Chloe and Christian were love's young dream, but their relationship ended in a messy breakup.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Daisy dumped King when she found out he was cheating on her. Lauren still holds a place in her heart for Blake, does he feel the same? Paul left his fiance Phil without saying a word.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Trust issues caused the breakup of Harry and Amber's relationship. Stefan cheated on Emma numerous times. Between them Louis and Molissa have eight children, will a single night together mend their relationship?

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Ellie's move abroad ended her relationship with Laura. Ruth and Ricardo's relationship suffered as they both prioritised their careers. Amy and Luke were lover's but Luke proposed to someone else.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: One Night with My Ex (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: A breakdown in communication caused the failure of Emma and Scott's relationship. Sophy and Sam never properly ended their love affair. How will Aiden react to the real reason Brendon broke up with him?

imdb.title: One Night with My Ex
akas: One Night with My Ex (United Kingdom)
plot: Fly-on-the-wall documentary series in which three sets of former couples each spend one night together in a luxury flat to see if they should get back together or permanently go their separate ways.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
